original_theorem: Prove that for all positive real numbers $a, b, c$ such that $a b c \geq 1$, the following inequality holds: $a+b+c \geq \frac{1+a}{1+b}+\frac{1+b}{1+c}+\frac{1+c}{1+a}$.
theorem_translation:
```lean4
theorem inequality_of_positive_reals_with_product_ge_one
    (a b c : ℝ)
    (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c)
    (h_prod : a * b * c ≥ 1) :
    a + b + c ≥ (1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a) := by
```

attempt_history.verified_code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem inequality_of_positive_reals_with_product_ge_one
    (a b c : ℝ)
    (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c)
    (h_prod : a * b * c ≥ 1) :
    a + b + c ≥ (1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• a, b, c are positive real numbers [tc_1]
Therefore, we conclude:
• The equality (1+a)/(1+b) + (1+b)/(1+c) + (1+c)/(1+a) = ((1+a)b)/(1+b) + ((1+b)c)/(1+c) + ((1+c)a)/(1+a) holds [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have l1 : a + b + c - ((1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a)) =
      (a * b - 1) / (1 + b) + (b * c - 1) / (1 + c) + (c * a - 1) / (1 + a) := by
    have h_denom_b : 1 + b ≠ 0 := by linarith [hb]
    have h_denom_c : 1 + c ≠ 0 := by linarith [hc]
    have h_denom_a : 1 + a ≠ 0 := by linarith [ha]
    field_simp [h_denom_a, h_denom_b, h_denom_c]
    ring

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem inequality_of_positive_reals_with_product_ge_one
    (a b c : ℝ)
    (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c)
    (h_prod : a * b * c ≥ 1) :
    a + b + c ≥ (1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a) := by
  have l1 : a + b + c - ((1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a)) =
      (a * b - 1) / (1 + b) + (b * c - 1) / (1 + c) + (c * a - 1) / (1 + a) := by
    have h_denom_b : 1 + b ≠ 0 := by linarith [hb]
    have h_denom_c : 1 + c ≠ 0 := by linarith [hc]

    field_simp [h_denom_a, h_denom_b, h_denom_c]

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• a, b, c are positive real numbers [tc_1]
Therefore, we conclude:
• The inequality ((1+a)b)/(1+b) + ((1+b)c)/(1+c) + ((1+c)a)/(1+a) ≥ 3 * ³√(((1+a)b)/(1+b) * ((1+b)c)/(1+c) * ((1+c)a)/(1+a)) holds by the AM-GM inequality [l2].

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem inequality_of_positive_reals_with_product_ge_one
    (a b c : ℝ)
    (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c)
    (h_prod : a * b * c ≥ 1) :
    a + b + c ≥ (1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a) := by
  have l1 : a + b + c - ((1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a)) =
      (a * b - 1) / (1 + b) + (b * c - 1) / (1 + c) + (c * a - 1) / (1 + a) := by
    have h_denom_b : 1 + b ≠ 0 := by linarith [hb]
    have h_denom_c : 1 + c ≠ 0 := by linarith [hc]
    have h_denom_a : 1 + a ≠ 0 := by linarith [ha]
    field_simp [h_denom_a, h_denom_b, h_denom_c]
    ring
  have l2 : ((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b) + ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c) + ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a) ≥
      3 * (((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b) * ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c) * ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a)) ^ (1/3 : ℝ) := by
    let x := ((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b)
    let y := ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c)
    let z := ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a)
    have hx_nonneg : 0 ≤ x := by positivity
    have hy_nonneg : 0 ≤ y := by positivity
    have hz_nonneg : 0 ≤ z := by positivity
    have am_gm_3 := Real.geom_mean_le_arith_mean₃ x y z hx_nonneg hy_nonneg hz_nonneg
    linarith [am_gm_3]
  sorry

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem inequality_of_positive_reals_with_product_ge_one
    (a b c : ℝ)
    (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c)
    (h_prod : a * b * c ≥ 1) :
    a + b + c ≥ (1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a) := by
  have l1 : a + b + c - ((1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a)) =
      (a * b - 1) / (1 + b) + (b * c - 1) / (1 + c) + (c * a - 1) / (1 + a) := by
    have h_denom_b : 1 + b ≠ 0 := by linarith [hb]
    have h_denom_c : 1 + c ≠ 0 := by linarith [hc]
    have h_denom_a : 1 + a ≠ 0 := by linarith [ha]
    field_simp [h_denom_a, h_denom_b, h_denom_c]
    ring
  have l2 : ((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b) + ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c) + ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a) ≥
      3 * (((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b) * ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c) * ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a)) ^ (1/3 : ℝ) := by
    let x := ((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b)
    let y := ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c)
    let z := ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a)
    have hx_nonneg : 0 ≤ x := by positivity
    have hy_nonneg : 0 ≤ y := by positivity
    have hz_nonneg : 0 ≤ z := by positivity
    have am_gm_3 := Real.geom_mean_le_arith_mean₃ x y z hx_nonneg hy_nonneg hz_nonneg
    linarith [am_gm_3]
  sorry

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem inequality_of_positive_reals_with_product_ge_one
    (a b c : ℝ)
    (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c)
    (h_prod : a * b * c ≥ 1) :
    a + b + c ≥ (1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a) := by
  have l1 : a + b + c - ((1 + a) / (1 + b) + (1 + b) / (1 + c) + (1 + c) / (1 + a)) =
      (a * b - 1) / (1 + b) + (b * c - 1) / (1 + c) + (c * a - 1) / (1 + a) := by
    have h_denom_b : 1 + b ≠ 0 := by linarith [hb]
    have h_denom_c : 1 + c ≠ 0 := by linarith [hc]
    have h_denom_a : 1 + a ≠ 0 := by linarith [ha]
    field_simp [h_denom_a, h_denom_b, h_denom_c]
    ring
  have l2 : ((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b) + ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c) + ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a) ≥
      3 * Real.cbrt (((1 + a) * b) / (1 + b) * ((1 + b) * c) / (1 + c) * ((1 + c) * a) / (1 + a)) := by
    rw [← Real.rpow_one_third_eq_cbrt]
    apply Real.am_gm3
